recorded_clinical_notes: Patient underwent total knee replacement surgery under general anaesthesia. Procedure lasted 2.5 hours. Estimated blood loss 300ml. Post-op vitals stable.
Post-surgical physiotherapy session. Range of motion exercises performed. Patient tolerated session well.
General anaesthesia administered for knee replacement. Duration: 2.5 hours. Monitoring throughout procedure.
Pre-operative blood work. All values within normal range. Patient cleared for surgery.
Pre-operative metabolic panel. Glucose, electrolytes, kidney and liver function all normal.
Pre-operative coagulation test. PT and INR within normal limits. Patient cleared for surgery.
